name: DragonScriber (Ludum Dare 33 entry)
description:
The keyboard is mightier than the sword! Slay knights with your draconic roaring powers by just spelling their names. Go kick their chivalrous derrieres!

Controls:

Space: Start the game
Letter keys: Hit enemies

Ludum Dare:

This game was created for the 33th edition of the Ludum Dare competition, in which you have to create a game with a certain theme within 48 hours. In this edition, the theme was "You are the Monster". That's why in this game you play as a Dragon, slaying knights who want to kidnap save the princess.

View this entry on the Ludum Dare website

UPDATE: This game was ranked #85 out of 1200 participants overall, and #54 on fun! I'm so proud, especially as this was my first time entering a game jam! Thanks to everyone for playing & rating this game!
